docs.snippet: Led by DeMar DeRozan’s 16 fourth-quarter points, Toronto won for the sixth time in seven games....

docs.snippet: After two whirlwind days, Jason Collins had a chance to focus on the Nets’ system in a practice....
docs.lead_paragraph: After two whirlwind days, Jason Collins had a chance to focus on the Nets’ system in a practice.
docs.abstract: Jason Collins says he welcomes the opportunity to focus simply on basketball following two whirlwind days in which he signed with the Brooklyn Nets, becoming NBA's first openly gay player.

headline.main: Pioneering Aside, Collins Just Tries to Learn Plays
headline.print_headline: Pioneering Aside, Collins Just Tries to Learn Plays

docs.snippet: Raymond Felton turned himself in early Tuesday after his wife’s lawyer turned in a handgun to the police, saying that it belonged to Felton and that he had threatened his wife with it....
docs.lead_paragraph: Raymond Felton turned himself in early Tuesday after his wife’s lawyer turned in a handgun to the police, saying that it belonged to Felton and that he had threatened his wife with it.
docs.abstract: New York Knicks point guard Raymond Felton turns himself over to authorities after his wife's lawyer provides police with handgun, saying it belonged to Felton and that he had threatened his wife with it; developments come amid divorce proceedings; Felton is charged with criminal weapons possession.

byline.contributor: James C. McKinley Jr. and Daniel E. Slotnik contributed reporting from New York, and Andrew Keh from Portland, Ore.
byline.original: By SCOTT CACCIOLA and J. DAVID GOODMAN

docs.lead_paragraph: After a series of injuries, the highly recruited guard Maurice Creek transferred from Indiana to George Washington, where he is carrying the Colonials to a surprisingly strong showing.
docs.abstract: Profile of highly recruited guard Maurice Creek, who is leading George Washington University to what could be its first NCAA tournament appearance in nearly a decade; Creek transferred from Indiana for his senior year following a long series of injuries.
